comment._content:
Construction site of the new headquarters building of J. P. Morgan & Co. 
The Bain/LOC image above was posted on April 23, 2010. 
See the explanation of the photo in the comments that follow this image:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4445107637/]

Yet another photo was posted on May 14, 2010:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4606571360/]

And this one, on May 28, 2010:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4647766798/]

LOC posted a Bain photo of the finished headquarters building on Nov. 4, 2011:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/6311899217/in/photostream/]
